Description: Red pottery vessel with rounded body and short neck; painted blackish matt lines; in three fragments; largest fragment partially repaired from smaller sherds.
Bibliographic references: Mackay E 1929a / Bahrein and Hemamieh (pl. VII: no. 24)
Reade & Burleigh 1978a / The 'Ali cemetery: old excavations, ivory and radiocarbon dating
Condition: Incomplete; in three fragments; largest fragment is partially repaired from smaller sherds.
Acquisition name: Donated by: British School of Archaeology, Egypt
